Get Data Functions

wrapper functions to load dataframes more convieniently

{% raw %}

get_dataframe[source]

get_dataframe(fn='dataset_training_477.csv', DATA_DIR=Path('/media/ScaleOut/vahldiek/MRI/SIJ'), preprocessed_images=True, grid_view=False, denoised=False)

Returns the dataframe with correct filenames for MRI-SpA project

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
df = get_dataframe()
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_test_dataframe[source]

get_test_dataframe(DATA_DIR=Path('/media/ScaleOut/vahldiek/MRI/SIJ'), preprocessed_images=True, grid_view=False, denoised=False)

Returns the test dataframe with correct filenames for MRI-SpA project

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
df = get_test_dataframe()
{% endraw %}
